information: La Fondation des 2 Vallées, is the joint venture of the Loire Valley in France and the Bandama Valley basin in the Côte d’Ivoire. Its main purpose is to cooperate on the farming, industrial, sales, education, health, culture, tourism, humanitarian activities of the 2 valleys and with the many other development initiatives in France and the Côte d'Ivoire. Our actions are primarily geared to farming and trading firms, institutions and sector chambers (chamber of agriculture, commerce and industry, trade guilds and various regional chambers). We are looking for suppliers of apple juice concentrate and orange juice concentrate from Europe: in 20-foot containers. We sell foodstuff and exotic fruit juices from the Côte d'Ivoire for importing into Europe: pure pineapple juice, cashew nuts, cashew apple juice, cocoa, etc. We will shortly be supplying mango purée packed in 200-litre drums, aseptic sacks or bespoke packaging to suit the customer.
address: 50 bis avenue Notre Dame du Lac
